trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Lakewood
There were no other sightings in Lakewood on or around December 13th 2011
divs: Sighting Details On my way to work, traveling south on Wadsworth,I live at 14th and Wadsworth area, in Lakewood. Trying to remember exactly where, jus know its where the road starts descending and Pikes peak is visible. its around 6:45am coulda been 6:46 or 47. Doin my usual while driving and scanning the skies when east of Pikes Peak a dull off white light appears, not to bright drops down a bit and then proceeds in a westerly direction for one second. In my best guess it traveled 30-50 miles in a second and then lost sight of it. From my view point I could see the whole area. All I saw was a light, too far,too fast. I couldn't tell if it flew over Pikes Peak or if it was in the area like Castle Rock area.
